Package it.polimi.ingsw.View

Class Cli

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.View.Cli
All Implemented Interfaces:
UserInterface
public class Cli
extends java.lang.Object
implements UserInterface
Cli Class contains all methods to let the Player decide which action he wants to perform, then generate and Action Message to send to the Server accordingly.

  • Constructor Summary

    • init

      public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> init()
      Method used on startup by the client (if in Cli mode) to print the game title and get the Server address and port as input from the user.
      Specified by:
      init in interface UserInterface
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of Objects containing the address String and the port int.

    • startOrJoin

      public boolean startOrJoin()
      Description copied from interface: UserInterface
      Used to get a boolean as input from the player to decide if he wants to start a new game or join an existing one.
      Specified by:
      startOrJoin in interface UserInterface
      Returns:
      true -> player wants to start a new game. false -> player wants to join an existing game.

    • initialChooseLeaderCards

      public Action initialChooseLeaderCards​(java.util.ArrayList<RedLeaderCard> leaderCards) throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Description copied from interface: UserInterface
      Used to get the initial LeaderCards as input from the player.
      Specified by:
      initialChooseLeaderCards in interface UserInterface
      Parameters:
      leaderCards - The 4 leader cards sent by the server to choose from.
      Returns:
      An Action Class message containing the 4 leader cards and methods to assign the 4 leader cards to the player inside the Model's Game.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the number of leader cards in the input ArrayList is != 4

    • initialChooseResources

      public Action initialChooseResources​(int resources)
      Description copied from interface: UserInterface
      Used to get the initial Resources as input from the player.
      Specified by:
      initialChooseResources in interface UserInterface
      Parameters:
      resources - The number of resources the player has to choose.
      Returns:
      An Action Class message containing all resources chosen and the places chosen by the player to put said resources.

    • actionPicker

      public Action actionPicker​(Game game) throws java.lang.IllegalStateException
      actionPicker method is used by the player to choose which action he wants to perform.
      Specified by:
      actionPicker in interface UserInterface
      Parameters:
      game - Current game being played by the Player
      Returns:
      a specific Action Class message Subclass casted to its SuperClass and ready to be notified and sent to the Server.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the Player does not have any Possible Action left.
